name: Ninja Araki
description:
Play as Araki, a young ninja who is ready to embark on a great adventure across medieval Japan.

Have patience Araki and do not hesitate to unsheathe your sword against the harbingers of doom.

Keep moving forward until your enemies are destroyed

Obtain as many collectibles and kill as many enemies to achieve the  highest rating possible in the level !

Made on Unity 2020 using C# scripting,Photoshop for 2D art

Art:-using free assets provided by unity  and and other assets,animations made by the team.

Have fun
